data.persona: We are the people who live in this town. We are common, and there are many of us.
data.description:
You are in the The Lagoon.
The Lagoon is a dark and mysterious place during the night hours.  A lot of moss and lily pads surround the shore.  The water is very murky.
There's a Lagoon, a lily pad, and a moss here.
The witch is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the witch, because she's leading me to her house.
data.mid_motivation: I want to discover where the witch lives so I can report it to my fellow townspeople tonight.
data.long_motivation: The townspeople and I are hoping to have a map showing where all of our citizens live.
